price: 9. Ye oyo azali na bokonzi ya likolo na nsé, Allah azali na boyebi na biloko binso.
arabic: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
